description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS) GSIN: D302A Stream 4 (B) Business Services: B.2 Business Architect and B.3 Business Consultant Stream 5 (P) Project Management Services: P.1 Change Management Consultant, P.7 Project Coordinator, and P.9 Project Manager Requirement Details Tendering Procedure: Selective Tendering
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Insider Risk Management Program
### Solicitation Information
* **Reference Number:** CB-842-94014643
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** 20230229
* **Publication Date:** December 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, 14:00 (EST)
* **Amendment Date:** January 12, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 22, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

### Tender Description
The Government of Canada's Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide advisory services for establishing a comprehensive Insider Risk Management (InRM) program. The program will address the threat environment to financial regulatory institutions.

### Procurement Information
* **Category:** SRV
* **Method of Supply:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Positions Available:**
	+ Stream 4 (B) Business Services: B.2 Business Architect, B.3 Business Consultant
	+ Stream 5 (P) Project Management Services: P.1 Change Management Consultant, P.7 Project Coordinator, P.9 Project Manager

### Pre-Qualified Vendors
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 10947482 Canada Inc.
* Accenture Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.

### Contact Information
If you have inquiries or require additional information, please contact Craig Kenny at contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca or (343) 550-0408.

### Notice URL and Documents:
Please note that the request for proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified suppliers.  “CanadaBUs.cA” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

### Trade Agreements:
* CPTPP
* CPFTA
* CKFTA
* CUFTA
* WTO GPA
* NAFTA
* CETA
* CFTA
* CP
* ALEMP

You are limited to 400 words. Please make sure your output adheres to the suggested markdown formatting. You need to summarize the provided information accurately. Rearrange, rephrase and reformat to make the text clear and easy to understand.

Feel
